markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Thrown Voice](/Feats.aspx?ID=2651) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Strix" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=342" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 137 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You've learned how to throw your voice through the winds, tricking others as to your location. You can cast [_ventriloquism_](/Spells.aspx?ID=356) as a primal innate spell once per day. If you're a [songbird strix](/Heritages.aspx?ID=150), you can cast it twice per day instead.
name: Thrown Voice
